subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|北|肉|alt2=月|c1=p|c2=s|ls=psc|t2=meat}}. Semantic {{lang|zh|肉}} was added to be distinguished from the derived meaning of {{lang|zh|北}} (“north”).

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ba||to carry (on back), shoulder}}.

Two pronunciations were distinguished in Middle Chinese: {{m|ltc||puʌi<sup>H</sup>|t=back}}, {{m|ltc||buʌi<sup>H</sup>|t=to turn one's back to; to betray}}.
